Articles.Content:
A couple of years ago, around the time I took a break from games, there was a mod in the works but now I can't for the life of me remember the name of it, or much at all about it really but here goes

It was (to my recollection) meant to work with Infernal Robotics

It was a script mod that allowed you to set up some pretty advanced scripts for how the servos in IR would run

 

This is all I can remember now. If anyone has the faintest clue which mod I am looking for, please chime in.

 

EDIT: Found it! [WIP][1.6] Infernal Robotics Sequencer (NEXT) 3.0.1

Edited September 19, 2020 by LN400
Found it
